sizzle verb [I]

sizzle verb [I]
(BE EXCITING/ATTRACTIVE)
informal to be interesting or exciting : Discover how love can sizzle between you and your partner. The second act sizzles with brilliant special effects.
informal to be very sexually attractive: Jessica Simpson sizzles in a low-cut silver dress.
